name: Crates & Creatures
description:
Snipe targets and fight off foes in this action-packed shooter!            

                       Can You Click Fast Enough?

Crates & Creatures is a first-person shooter where the player tests their aim by shooting crates and enemy creatures. The player will have to clear all the moving targets and enemies in order to unlock the next stage of the game. Each stage will be more difficult than the last as the player progresses through the game. When the player unlocks a new stage enemies will immediately start charging at them.
